info.description:
This is a collection of Financial Hierarchy APIs in the Organization domain

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v2/organization`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Organization Financial Hierarchy

get.summary: Returns Financial Hierarchy data with new and legacy Org Values in a flattened structure

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

hierarchyGroupParam.name: hierarchy_group
hierarchyGroupParam.description: comma separated list of hierarchy levels. This is used to limit the return set to only include specified org levels. Accepted values - CMP, DIV, BSU, LOB, REG, DST, PC, LOC, SLOC

orgValueParam.name: org_value
orgValueParam.description: provide business organization code in URL to filter data set

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment. Only applicable in QA.

country_code.description: corresponding country code for the orgization value

line_of_business_name.description: Name of the Line of Business

line_of_business_value.description: Value of the Line of the Business
